alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:13PM EDT until July 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Branch County in southwestern Michigan... Northwestern Hillsdale County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 312 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Union City, or 7 miles northwest of Coldwater, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Hillsdale, Jonesville, Quincy, Union City, Litchfield, Long Lake, Girard, Moscow, North Adams, Bear Lake, Allen, Lake Wilson, Shadyside, Osseo, South Butler, Marble Lake, and Hodunk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
